sn22.146:4.2: “Mendicants, when someone from a good family has gone forth out of faith, this is what’s in line with the teachings.
sn22.146:4.3: They should live full of disillusionment for form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
sn22.146:4.11: they completely understand form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
sn22.146:4.15: Completely understanding form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness, they’re freed from these things. They’re freed from birth, old age, and death, from sorrow, crying, pain, sadness, and distress. They’re freed from suffering, I say.”
